name: google_keyword_generator
description: Generate SEO keywords using Google Autosuggest API. Perfect for content creators, SEO specialists, and marketers who need keyword research and suggestions.
author: Skillbox Team

n8n_webhook_url.title: n8n Webhook URL
n8n_webhook_url.description: The complete webhook URL from your n8n instance (e.g., https://carstenrossi.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/76a63718-b3cb-4141-bc55-efa614d13f1d)

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout for the webhook request in seconds

max_keywords.title: Maximum Keywords
max_keywords.description: Maximum number of keywords to return

country_code.title: Country Code
country_code.description: Google country code for localized suggestions

manifest.name: google_keyword_generator
manifest.description: Generate SEO keywords using Google Autosuggest API. Perfect for content creators, SEO specialists, and marketers who need keyword research and suggestions.
manifest.author: Skillbox Team

functions.name: generate_keywords
functions.description: Generate keyword suggestions based on a seed keyword using Google Autosuggest. Use this when users ask for keyword research, SEO suggestions, content ideas, or related search terms.

keyword.description: The seed keyword or phrase to generate suggestions for (e.g., 'digital marketing', 'web development')

seed_keyword.description: Alternative parameter name for the seed keyword (same as 'keyword')

query.description: Alternative parameter name for the search query (same as 'keyword')

functions.name: bulk_keyword_research
functions.description: Generate keywords for multiple seed terms at once. Useful for comprehensive keyword research.

keywords.description: Array of seed keywords to research (e.g., ['SEO', 'content marketing', 'social media'])

combine_results.description: Whether to combine all results into one list or return separate lists

n8n_webhook_url.description: The webhook URL from your n8n workflow instance

max_keywords.description: Maximum number of keywords to return per request
